Headline: Trains bypassing 35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 35TH due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 35TH due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail line.

This may include  the #29 State

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
